website_summaries.verdict: The perfect budget audio bundle for older cars with a single din bay. Provides an almost instant upgrade.
pros: Single-din design is compatible with many base factory stereo systems found on many older vehicles
The upgraded stereo adds Bluetooth connectivity for use with audio streaming and hands-free calling while driving
cons: The included pair of upgraded speakers require a similar-sized set to replace

website_summaries.verdict: The complete package for upgrading your vehicle's sound system with a Boss receiver and dual two-way speakers.
pros: The additional 6.5-inch two-way speakers offer better sound output than typical factory-installed speaker systems
The stereo receiver features a simple control layout that is easy to access while driving
cons: Included speakers require extra steps to install without professional help or installation

customer_reviews.title: arrived promptly and in good condition. Works quite well and the speakers have ...
customer_reviews.text: arrived promptly and in good condition. Works quite well and the speakers have decent sound. I needed this for my truck while driving and not some hundreds dollar state of the art affair like for my Rolls (if I had one). Easy installation and easy to follow instructions. Like to see someone offer the same with the old fashion, two knob radio style. That would be great for us hot rodders from yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: Monty

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but....
customer_reviews.text: The remote didn't work and the front bezel wouldn't stay on. As for the radio itself I liked it. It was easy to setup and use and had good sound quality. I did not like that all the buttons on the radio felt the same, there was no way to know which buttons I was pressing just by feel. The remote was the same way. I dont like having to look at the radio or remote just to change radio stations. The speakers seemed pretty good too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Shuster

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality stereo.
customer_reviews.text: Stereo does not work well at all. Bluetooth to phone has such terrible sound, cannot use for phone call. Several times now it has froze up and been unable to use. It was a cheap price, but not worth it. The speakers don't sound very good and the stereo itself is just very poor quality. I hoped it would straighten itself out in some way, but it hasnt. I don't have the money to pay to have it taken out and a new one installed.
customer_reviews.author: BikerChic73

customer_reviews.title: Nice surprise!
customer_reviews.text: Didnt need anything powerful just something to listen to music on my jump drive. I was pleasantly surprised. Works great with great sound. If you dont need anything super over the top loud, this is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: fabphil

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality
customer_reviews.text: Pretty bad sound overall. I swapped it back out with a sony that is only 50 watts and the sound quality was night and day. But the Sony was 120 dollars. This thing is only 37 bucks. Works for a simple radio in an old truck but not amazng. Speakers were a bit crackly at times. But it has ok settings and a decent display. Know what your doing before you hook it up.
customer_reviews.author: Zak Taylor

customer_reviews.title: No more wasting time with CDs. Plus it's a "BOSS
customer_reviews.text: Great awesome product. Would recommend this to more digital music lovers. Not a CD player.... At all. I like that. Cds are a thing of the past and will inevitability scratch and only holds up to a small amount of tracks. This has Bluetooth, USB, aux and a phone conversation button to allow hands free communication capabilities. Plus a set 2-way full range replacement speakers. Come on. Be honest... The price is right. Thanx Amazon and BOSS
customer_reviews.author: Sliq

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh. Look for. Better deal.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for with this package. The Bluetooth only connects when it wants. I often have to make my phone “forget” the connection and the out it again to make it work. The speakers are trash, so do yourself a favor and invest a little more money in better speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: 2month update
customer_reviews.text: Got this for an older car had to get a universal kit plays great main reason i got is for the aux.because i listen to radio stations in California or SiriusXM agreat value for an older vehicle 2months later unit dtill sounds great no issues like other people are saying had one speaker going in snd out and cracking tightened up screws fixed issue working great love it
customer_reviews.author: Bill Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Cheap trash. Worked well for a couple days.
customer_reviews.text: After one week I need to change my review. The power button needs to be pressed up to 12 times to get the thing to turn on. The selection dial sticks. The bottom half of the display quit working. When using an SD card on random the same songs play in the same order every time it is turned off and then on again. Trash.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Stereo trash speakers ok
customer_reviews.text: The 1st stereo the screen died it was showing trash on the screen returned it for a replacement 2nd unit lasted 1 week same trash. The speakers are fine but the stereo is trash. I have pictures and videos of both u its.
customer_reviews.author: Salvador Ramos L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: hey, this is pretty nice. Bought it for my girlfriend's father in her behalf, this was very convenient since is like a COMBO - PACK . The guy is very happy with his father's day gift, the speakers are very clear and perfect. The device is great, with proper setting options to set the proper configuration on latin music when he is working. Gladly give more reviews for Boss, send me one for me! hehe thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Raúl Martínez

customer_reviews.title: I like it (don't really love it)
customer_reviews.text: I like it (don't really love it). It does do the job for a very reasonable price. It is much better compare with the original one. What else can you ask for at this price? usb, aux, and bluetooth (the most imporat for me). The bottons feels cheap and you can't dim the brightness, but is ok. So far so good, let's see how much it last

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you install it before the return time limit lapses.
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchased this item for me for Christmas. I have not had the opportunity to install it until today. Hooked everything up as per directions only to learn that it would not work. checked the fuse, it is good. Checked for voltage to unit, 12 volts at input wire. Still nothing working. came inside to do return only to learn that there is a time limit on returning this item and of course it has come and gone.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

But there is nothing but static to the speakers, even hooked up independently, the only way to get sound is to hold on to the back of the radio and bush the wires and the connector hard into the radio and then you can hear some words but still mostly static. JUNK

customer_reviews.title: Well I will not write a review on this item ...

customer_reviews.text: The unit works great. No complaints about the unit but as far as the speakers go, they are no good. Installed them today. Worked fine for a good 45 minutes. Got in my truck to go to the store and they were cracking, as if they were blown. I had only turned the stereo up two thirds of the way up before and now they Crackle at half way turned up

customer_reviews.title: Nice little Sterio with just the right features

product_meta.title: BOSS Audio Systems 656BCK Car Stereo Package - Single Din, Bluetooth, CD MP3 USB AM FM Radio, 6.5 Inch 2 Way Full Range Speakers, Black
product_meta.description: Style:Bluetooth CD Receiver BundleBlast your favorite tunes on the BOSS Audio 656BCK Receiver and Speaker Package. Included in this combo kit are the 508UAB Receiver and a pair of CK65 2-Way 6.5" Speakers with a Poly Cone Woofer. Give your music a boost and pop in a CD, turn on the AM/FM radio, hook up an MP3 player or your smartphone to the Auxiliary input or plug into the USB port for more choice. Bluetooth technology lets you stream music apps like Pandora and Spotify or make calls hands-free. Pump up the volume and enjoy your next road trip with the BOSS Audio 656BCK. For further product details, please scroll down.
feature_bullets: 508UAB Receiver Plays Bluetooth, CD / USB / MP3, AM/FM Radio, Digital MEDIA from Smart Phones
Inputs: USB Audio / USB Charging / AUX
508UAB has 50 Watts x 4 Max Power and Preset built-in EQ
One Pair of CK65 6.5" 2-Way Speakers with Poly Cone Woofer and Foam Surround
250 Watts MAX, 180 Watts RMS Power Handling per Pair of Speakers
One Pair Of Ck65 Speakers With Grills
Memory Slots Available: Sd Memory Card
